amendment.description: To strike the provision relating to the Governors and alternate governors of the International Monetary Fund and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development.

action.text: Amendment SA 514 proposed by Senator Toomey.

vote.text: Amendment SA 514 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 514 is considered as having been agreed to prior to the adoption, on 6/28/2011, of the manager's package (SA 520) to the bill (S. 679) by Unanimous Consent.
